category: news
title: "Trax Names Former Google AI Leader, Barak Turovsky, as Chief Product Officer"
excerpt: "Trax, a leading global provider of computer vision solutions and analytics for retail, today announced the appointment of Barak Turovsky as it (CPO). Under Turovsky’s leadership, Trax combines its product and engineering teams to support the company’s growth and enable development of new solutions to meet market needs."
